definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Yun brocade, rich and grand, is jacquard weave and usually interwoven with gold or silver threads.
sentences.chinese: 雲錦華貴瑰麗，常用金線或銀線在提花機上織出。

sentences.english: The new and further developments of leno technique for jacquard and aims at extended use are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了大提花紗羅織造技術的新進展和更廣闊的應用。

sentences.english: This is a double-knit jacquard circular knitting machine.
sentences.chinese: 本機是雙面提花圓緯機。

sentences.english: Jacquard fabrics, we usually use basic structure and Variety structure.
sentences.chinese: 大提花組織，多用常規簡單變化組織。

sentences.english: The broche fabrics of jacquard weave designs sexy night.
sentences.chinese: 提花的織錦面料設計性感的夜晚。

sentences.english: She leaned her head against the window curtains, which smelled of the dust.
sentences.chinese: 她把頭靠在窗簾上，鼻孔裏是提花窗簾的塵土味。

sentences.english: We have duly received the goods of our Order No. A105 for Cotton Jacquard Bath Towels.
sentences.chinese: 我方第A105號訂單項下提花浴巾已及時收到。

sentences.english: The Jacquard card originates from Chinese ancient pattern sketch.
sentences.chinese: 提花機上的紋板源於我國古代的花木。

sentences.english: In Qin-Han Dynasty people had produced the first refining flowers machine.
sentences.chinese: 到秦漢時期人們已經發明瞭第一部提花機。

sentences.english: Gold leather shoes with signature CC.
sentences.chinese: CC的圖形提花，金色的皮革製造。

sentences.english: Our factory is special enterprise of producing big jacquard weave are carpet.
sentences.chinese: 是專業生產大提花工藝地毯的企業。

sentences.english: Fabrics with extremely complicated woven designs are manufactured using Jacquard loom attachments.
sentences.chinese: 極其複雜的機織圖案要使用提花機的機構生產。

sentences.english: The large jacquard indicates the level of manufacture and application of a jacquard trade.
sentences.chinese: 大紋針提花機是提花機行業生產和應用水平的標誌。

sentences.english: The large jacquard indicates the level of manufacture and application of a jacquard trade.
sentences.chinese: 大紋針提花機是提花機行業生產和應用水平的標誌。
